title: modern logo font
author: gczh

comments.content: I'm sorry for the "modern" thing but I see [Times](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065307/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Times)...

Hey Ryuk, thanks so much for your help! I think you have gotten it right! I tried Times out and it's almost the same except for the diagonal line in the letter 'N' which seems to be thicker in the logo.
